titleStmt.title: An Account of the late hardships and violence inflicted upon certain persons called Quakers for their peaceable religious meetings in the city and county of Glocester

notesStmt.note: Caption title: A coppy of a letter dated from Glocester City Gaol, the 11th of the 12th month, 1681-2 : giving account to some friends at London of the late hardships ...
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
